response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled quality. We believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations.

Considering the immense worth this product holds for you, we are extending an offer to purchase it at a special price tailored specifically for you. Our proposed price is $1,150,000. This offer not only ensures you receive the best value but also secures a transaction that benefits both parties.

Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
